actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, Transportation and Infrastructure, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To clarify regulatory certainty, and for other purposes.
short_title: Simplify Timelines and Assure Regulatory Transparency Act

summary.text:
Simplify Timelines and Assure Regulatory Transparency Act or the START Act

This bill sets forth a variety of provisions to expedite the environmental review of energy projects.

titles.title: Simplify Timelines and Assure Regulatory Transparency Act
To clarify regulatory certainty, and for other purposes.
